page.title: 17GAMES
page.content: Some of the games we play at Selattyn are the same games they play out of our area only they have different names like the game Areoplane,tick or tunnel daber, in the Roman Catholic they call it stuck in the mud. Gemma Edwards made up a game called Bananas and any number can play it but if there is over eight, two people has to be on, Lets pretend 6 people are playing, one person has to be on they choose a good place for their den, and the rest of the people run off, NOT to far though That person thats on counts to 10 then comes after them. If he catches them he takes a person with him back to his den and puts their hands above their head. Then they cannot get away from the the den.
